attributes.action: Face an international court and be tried for crimes against humanity in Iraq
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over 600,000 innocent people have been slaughtered as a result of the illegal war that Mr Blair led this country into.

One day he will face the consequences for his actions, and we the undersigned demand that he stand trail at an international court and be tried for war crimes.

reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
